MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY15 postcode area of Montgomery, affecting properties in Arthurs Gate and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to repairs required to an underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:28AM on 19th January 2021
